nodes.title: Remove redundant settings.gradle to fix Android Studio import problem
Minor: fix typo in debug message
Make getStickyEvent and removeStickyEvent generic so the caller doesn't ...
Added ready to copy/paste dependency for maven in README
Added Performance test files for broadcast and localbroadcast
Fix spelling mistake in method name
Decoupled Android EventBus from Core EventBus. Removed the need to Jetify this library.
add the ability of registerWeak, which could help reduce memory leak
Ignore androidx package to avoid tripping over new API.
Delete the judgtment of subscriberMethods.isEmpty() issue  #619
Update Gradle and and plugins, fix Travis build
eventQueue uses LinkedList for better performance
make PackageElement detect in the official recommend way
Use weak reference instead of strong reference to avoid memory leak.
When using "subscriberInfoIndexes". Skips reflections to find the parent's subscription information.
New Feature proposal: Partial registering and unregistering
Fix empty test suite error for EventBusTest module.
Specify SubscriberIndex size when initializing HashMap
Reflection-less Index generation [Upto 70% improvement in performance]
Renamed the variables according to the best practices.
add nolog option to ignore generics or fallback logs
extracted annotation to a separate artifact
Documented two methods checkHasNoErrors() and getClassString()
proper priority handling for events with inheritance
#284 - Allow registration of classes without any subscriptions
Added ThreadMode.MAIN_ASYNC to queue event delivery for a future loop of the Main UI Thread.
fix: issue #238, do strict method verification default
handling NoClassDefFoundError when calling getAnnotation in SubscriberMethodFinder
Move and port tests from EventBusTest to EventBus module
Make Android Studio and IntelliJ Idea happy
Fixed a java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError exception on some device
Don't throw exception for absence public methods with the @Subscribe annotation if throwSubscriberException=false
ability to support application specific loggers
fix NoSuchMethodException  issue on low api device with high api method
fix can't display <init> tag in HOWTO.md #141
Sending NoSubscriberEvent when subscription is not active.
Feature: subscriber registration with downcasting event type.
BackgroudPoster can post thread more then one time
added support for alternate (non main) looper
Fixes issue #76 - Subscribers are invoked for all events instead of registered events (https://github.com/greenrobot/EventBus/issues/76)
